item.title: Recipe: Roasted broccoli salad with rice and feta
item.description: Roasted broccoli salad with rice and feta For the rice: prepare 1.5 cups rice according to your taste. Do this first. For the broccoli: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. Cut a few heads of broccoli into bite sized florets. Mix in a bowl with olive oil, then place on a cookie sheet. Sprinkle sea salt on top. Roast 12-15 minutes until the broccoli is every so slightly browned on top.

item.title: Radish salad with soy and sesame dressing
item.description: This is the simplest possible thing to make with a bunch of radishes fresh from farmers market ($1.25 this week). one bunch radishes vinegar soy sauce sesame oil Wash and trim the radishes.  Slice thin, put in a bowl.  Add vinegar (I used white vinegar, but rice vinegar would do well), soy sauce, and a little sesame oil; you're after enough to moisten, not to cover.  Let sit a few minutes before eating.
